title: Skuttle Ate a Whole Graves Ult
body:
This link here is to a video of a graves trying to ult a dead gnar.
however, I guess the skuttle ate the entire ult or somethng becasue it doesnt even touch the gnar.
Nerf the skuttle 2016.

http://plays.tv/s/Ky2ZMDngCAjb

I have not tried re-creating this.

replies.body:
Skuttles said maybe if graves had his cigar he would do damage.

Skuttles - denying cait's ults (and now graves from this bug) for 2 years now.
whhhhat!? it denys caits ult too?!
Yup, that's how skuttles first got famous was with it's Leg-en-dary cait ult blocks.
